mapper.update: update shows set year=#{year}, performer=#{performer}, genre=#{genre}, platform=#{platform}, story=#{story}, updatePer=#{updatePer} where showNum=#{showNum}
mapper.select: select * from showComment where showNum=#{showNum} order by num desc
mapper.update: update shows set likes=likes+1 where showNum=#{showNum}
update shows set likes=likes-1 where showNum=#{showNum}
mapper.delete: delete from likeShow where id=#{id} and showNum=#{showNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from likeShow where showNum=#{showNum}

select a.showNum, a.title, a.year, a.genre, a.poster, a.likes, b.liketime, b.id from shows a, likeshow b where a.showNum=b.showNum and b.id=#{id} order by liketime desc
